title.rendered: Why using AI in clinical trials has become the new normal

<title>Why Using AI in Clinical Trials Becomes the New Normal— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Using AI in clinical trials can help with patient recruitment, minimize participant dropout, and generally speed up the study. Check out our new article to discover other benefits of AI and machine learning in clinical trials and learn about the challenges you might face during implementation." />
